channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Mark Carney Calls Snap Elections in Canada Amid Trump Threats
item.description: Mark Carney, who has only been prime minister for 10 days, has called for a general election to be held on April 28.

item.title: Immigrants and Freedom of Speech
item.description: President Trump is taking advantage of an unsettled aspect of the law.

item.title: AI avatars’ lack of authenticity won’t stop them from joining the creator economy—and giving humans a run for their money
item.description: Human creators are already competing for attention among the AI slop that’s become pervasive across platforms like Pinterest and Instagram Reels.

item.title: In Congress, Republicans steer clear of investing in Trump Media or Tesla
item.description: Politically, Republicans can’t get enough of what President Trump and Elon Musk have wrought. But they have not put their money where their mouths are...

item.title: Wall Street braces for Trump’s April 2 tariff deadline—it foresees 18% EU import duties and a 43% chance of a U.S. recession
item.description: Analysts expect tariffs on the EU, a key trading partner for the U.S., to settle at around 18% as recession expectations hit more than 40%.

item.title: Inside the futuristic biotech startup Cellares that’s building a cure for cancer with $355 million in funding
item.description: Why New Jersey is a hub for biotech manufacturing.

item.title: An ‘Aggressive’ Trip to Greenland, and the Pope’s First Appearance Since Falling Ill
item.description: Plus, how George Foreman transformed American kitchens.

item.title: Phylicia Rashad Knows Her Purpose
item.description: Five decades into her career, the Tony Award-winning actress and TV icon, making her Broadway directing debut, feels like “part of something bigger.”

item.title: Wildfires force evacuation in North Carolina while it’s still recovering from Hurricane Helene—and also hit South Carolina and New Jersey
item.description: The North Carolina Forest Service's online wildfire public viewer indicated active fires Sunday in Burke County and in Stokes County on the northern b...

item.description: Mark Carney, who has only been prime minister for 10 days, has called for a general election to be held on April 28.

item.title: Trump Did What Castros Couldn’t: Take Radio Martí Off the Air
item.description: For four decades, a U.S.-financed broadcaster provoked the ire of the communist government in Cuba. President Trump dismantled it in a matter of days.

item.title: Lebanon, Ravaged by Israel-Hezbollah War, Needs Changes to Unlock Aid
item.description: For years, the country has failed to enact financial and governance overhauls required by lenders. The recent fighting has made that problem urgent.
